snippet: Over three innings, Noah Syndergaard issued three walks, allowed two hits and surrendered two runs.
abstract: New York Mets top pitching prospect Noah Syndergaard turns in shaky performance in preseason game against the Detroit Tigers.
lead_paragraph: Over three innings, Noah Syndergaard issued three walks, allowed two hits and surrendered two runs.

headline.main: Mets’ Top Prospect Has Shaky Outing but Remains Upbeat
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Top Prospect Has Shaky Outing but Remains Upbeat
